Name: cone-rod dystrophy
Definition: A retinal degeneration that characterized by progressive deterioration of the cone and rod photoreceptor cells.

Name: Bietti crystalline corneoretinal dystrophy
Definition: A retinal degeneration that is characterized by crystals in the cornea

Name: late-onset retinal degeneration
Definition: A retinal degeneration characterized by autosomal dominant inheritance of night blindness and drusen deposits

Name: retinitis pigmentosa
Definition: A retinal degeneration characterized by the gradual deterioration of the photoreceptors or the retinal pigment epithelium of the retina leading to progressive sight loss.

Name: obsolete hereditary and idiopathic peripheral neuropathy
Definition: A retinal degeneration characterized by the gradual deterioration of the photoreceptors or the retinal pigment epithelium of the retina leading to progressive sight loss.

Name: peripheral retinal degeneration
Definition: A meningitis that is characterized by meningeal inflammation not caused by an identifiable bacterial pathogen in the cerebrospinal fluid. A large majority of them are caused by enteroviruses.

Name: macular degeneration
Definition: A retinal degeneration characterized by gradual deterioration of light-sensing cells in the tissues at the back of the eye and has_symptom vision loss.

Name: retinoschisis
Definition: A syndrome that is characterized by absence or underdeveloped tissue connecting the left and right halves of the brain
